Key Match Events: Malik Monk scored 31 points, including 11 in the fourth quarter to help close out the game for the Kings.
Sacramento Kings shot 21-of-47, 44.7%, from beyond the arc with seven players making a three.
Post-Match Reflections: The Kings look like they are finding their identity as a team that is going to outwork their opponent, which is an absolute joy to watch develop.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jaylen Wells scored a career-high 30 points on a hyper-efficient 8-of-9, 88.9%, from the field for the Memphis Grizzlies.
Others: De'Aaron Fox was called for a flagrant foul on Scotty Pippen Jr. and Jaren Jackson Jr. was called for a flagrant when he hip-checked Fox going up for a dunk.
